__e: She will not escape us again.
And if I tell them to hold off and we turn up and find out that he's got away..
Come on, come on, he's getting away.
Nobody gets away from me, but you did.
Don't you doubt it. He won't escape from me.
No matter what I do to secure her cage, she always finds a way to get out.
I almost had him, but as he slipped through my fingers.
And yet, the only person that can never escape him is himself.
Hey, give me back my money!
